data.persona: I am a dragon living in the mountains. I enjoy hoarding treasure. I terrorize the local populace for fun.
data.description:
You are in the Dangerous Precipice.
The dangerous precipice overlooks the valley below.  The ground slopes down to the edge here.  Dirt crumbles down to the edge of the cliff.
There's a dragon crescent, a knight's armor, a golden dragon egg, and a knight's fighting gear here.
A knight is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to recover the dragon egg that was stolen.
data.mid_motivation: I need to return the golden dragon egg to my treasure hoard.
data.long_motivation: I need to build the largest hoard ever attained by any one dragon.
